Lyric:
[00:04.620]Just one last dance....oh baby...just one last dance
[00:22.810]We meet in the night in the Spanish cafĂŠ
[00:26.600]I look in your eyes just don't know what to say
[00:31.520]It feels like I'm drowning in salty water
[00:38.370]A few hours left 'til the sun's gonna rise
[00:42.350]tomorrow will come an it's time to realize
[00:46.780]our love has finished forever
[00:52.740]how I wish to come with you (wish to come with you)
[00:56.370]how I wish we make it through
[01:01.340]Just one last dance
[01:05.040]before we say goodbye
[01:08.710]when we sway and turn round and round and round
[01:13.940]it's like the first time
[01:16.760]Just one more chance
[01:20.420]hold me tight and keep me warm
[01:24.040]cause the night is getting cold
[01:27.470]and I don't know where I belong
[01:32.380]Just one last dance
[01:42.850]The wine and the lights and the Spanish guitar
[01:46.710]I'll never forget how romantic they are
[01:51.140]but I know, tomorrow I'll lose the one I love
[01:57.460]There's no way to come with you
[02:01.170]it's the only thing to do
[02:07.240]Just one last dance
[02:10.790]before we say goodbye
[02:14.500]when we sway and turn round and round and round
[02:19.850]it's like the first time
[02:22.510]Just one more chance
[02:26.130]hold me tight and keep me warm
[02:28.770]cause the night is getting cold
[02:32.430]and I don't know where I belong
[02:36.980]Just one last dance

[02:52.640]Just one last dance
[02:56.150]before we say goodbye
[02:59.950]when we sway and turn round and round and round
[03:05.310]it's like the first time
[03:07.960]Just one more chance
[03:11.710]hold me tight and keep me warm
[03:15.330]cause the night is getting cold
[03:18.850]and I don't know where I belong
[03:23.850]Just one last dance
[03:27.150]before we say goodbye
[03:30.770]when we sway and turn round and round and round (When we sway turn around)
[03:36.730]it's like the first time(hold my tight oh my love)
[03:39.210]Just one more chance

[03:45.950]cause the night is getting cold(the night is getting cold)
[03:49.450]and I don't know where I belong(don't know where I belong)

[04:00.280]Just one last dance
